title: Fix PDF export design images and restore colorful formatting

requirements.text: Fix PDF export to embed actual design images from the Design Image Page instead of showing placeholder text like '[Design Image: CHTMN40009]'. The system must fetch uploaded design images by design code and convert them to a format suitable for PDF embedding (base64 or similar).

quotes: Why is image not available for design code *CHTMN40009* in export pdf when actually image for that design is already available
Yes design are uploaded in design page as per design code

acceptanceCriteria: PDF export displays actual design images for all design codes that have images uploaded
Design code CHTMN40009 shows the gold chain image in the PDF export
If a design image is truly missing, show 'Image Not Available' text instead of placeholder brackets

requirements.text: Restore the colorful PDF export structure from the previous version, including green header rows for each design group, visual distinction between design sections, and sorting orders by design code from lower to higher within each group.

quotes: About colourful structure, the data in export pdf was sorted from lower design code to higher and then then it had green headers etc, why did such updated get changed in new deployment?

acceptanceCriteria: Each design group in the PDF has a green header row with the design code
Orders are sorted by design code numerically (lower to higher)
Visual formatting matches the previous colorful structure with clear separation between design groups
Table headers maintain green background color (#4CAF50 or similar)

constraints: Do not change any other features in the app - only modify PDF export functionality
Maintain all existing order management, dashboard, and design mapping features
Preserve the current Excel import/export functionality
Keep all existing UI components and layouts unchanged except for PDF export styling
nonGoals: Modifying the web interface display of design images
Changing the Design Image Page upload functionality
Altering order table row selection or bulk actions
Modifying any dashboard tabs or summary cards
Changing barcode scanning or tag printing features
